"Just another bunch looking to make a buck from everything you, the members, have built here. They see a good product to build content for their site and make a few dollars in the process. If you want to impress me, provide the videos for free or kick in some of those profits to pay for servers on VATSIM. But don't sit here and blow smoke up my derriĂ¨re about how you don't benefit."

Locked by a complete loser:

Richard Jenkins VATSIM Co-Founder
